title: DDFP 407: Week 12 preview & Turkey Bowl Draft
itunes:title: DDFP 407: Week 12 preview & Turkey Bowl Draft
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank and Elliot Harrison to make their Week 12 "Red Challenge Flag" picks. Plus, in the show's "Turkey Bowl Draft," Shek, Hank and Elliot select their NFL Media dream teams, choosing from a pool of their co-workers, including Kurt Warner, Deion Sanders, Dan Hanzus, Maurice Jones-Drew and Amber Theoharis.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
